arts.ttl: Bologna vs. Hellas Verona will close out 2024
arts.sum: Hellas Verona are the only team that haven’t dropped any points from leading situations in Serie A this season; on the other hand, Bologna have lost the most points from winning positions in home matches (six). Bologna have won just one of their last five Serie A games against Hellas Verona (D2 L2), although it the most recent one: 2-0 on 23rd February 2024 (goals netted by Fabbian and Freuler).
